gov.nih.nci.ncia.curation
Class CurationDataDownload

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.ncia.curation.CurationDataDownload

public class CurationDataDownload
extends java.lang.Object

This class will create an xml document from the SelectedSeriesItemBeans of type CurationData.xsd Currently the code does not validate since I ran out of time... but it will soon

Constructor Detail

CurationDataDownload

public CurationDataDownload(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,gov.nih.nci.ncia.dto.SeriesDTO> basketItems)
This is the only place to populate the actual items that you want curation data for. This alleviates any synchronization issues of having the desired elements changing as the curation data is being created. I wanted to make this as thread friendly, for the off chance that we have a need to spin these off as seperate threads in the future.

Parameters:
basketItems -
Method Detail

assembleCurationDataXML

public java.lang.String assembleCurationDataXML()
This is the actual call to begin kicking off the gathering of the curation data, you must fire this method if you want to retreive the xml document.

Returns:
file path the path to the temp files for this curation download
